org.apache.oodt.cas.filemgr.versioning

Class ConfigurableMetadataBasedFileVersioner

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.oodt.cas.filemgr.versioning.MetadataBasedFileVersioner
      • org.apache.oodt.cas.filemgr.versioning.ConfigurableMetadataBasedFileVersioner
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Versioner

    public class ConfigurableMetadataBasedFileVersioner
extends MetadataBasedFileVersioner
    A MetadataBasedFileVersioner which is configurable via java properties. Set the following java property to configure file_spec per product type: org.apache.oodt.cas.filemgr.versioning.configuration. Or set the following java property to configure all product types: org.apache.oodt.cas.filemgr.versioning.configuration.all_product_types
    Author:
    bfoster@apache.org (Brian Foster)
